`[`*[DeveloperAPIMonitorExceptions Prev - Syncless.Monitor.Exceptions]* `|` *[DeveloperAPIProfiling Next - Syncless.Profiling]*`]`

Provides classes which enclose information needed to send notification among classes and between main logic layer and user interface layer.

= Interfaces Summary =

|| || *Interface* || *Description* ||
|| http://big5sync.googlecode.com/files/pubinterface.gif || [#INotificationQueue INotificationQueue] || Interface for implementing a notification queue. Classes which implement the interface must implement Enqueue, Dequeue, !AddObserver and !HasNotification methods. ||
|| http://big5sync.googlecode.com/files/pubinterface.gif || [#IQueueObserver IQueueObserver] || Interface which provides a mechanism for receiving notifications from classes implementing INotificationQueue interface. ||
|| http://big5sync.googlecode.com/files/pubinterface.gif || [#ISyncProgressObserver ISyncProgressObserver] || Interface to observe a synchronization progress. ||

= Classes Summary =

|| || *Class* || *Description* ||
|| http://big5sync.googlecode.com/files/pubclass.gif || [#AbstractNotification AbstractNotification] || The abstract parent file for all notification. ||
|| http://big5sync.googlecode.com/files/pubclass.gif || [#AddTagNotification AddTagNotification] || The notification for adding a Tag. ||
|| http://big5sync.googlecode.com/files/pubclass.gif || [#AutoSyncCompleteNotification AutoSyncCompleteNotification] || The notification for automatic synchronization completed. ||
|| http://big5sync.googlecode.com/files/pubclass.gif || [#CancelSyncNotification CancelSyncNotification] || The notification for cancelling a sync request. ||
|| http://big5sync.googlecode.com/files/pubclass.gif || [#MessageNotification MessageNotification] || The notification for sending message. ||
|| http://big5sync.googlecode.com/files/pubclass.gif || [#MonitorPathNotification MonitorPathNotification] || The notification to inform logic to monitor a path. ||
|| http://big5sync.googlecode.com/files/pubclass.gif || [#MonitorTagNotification MonitorTagNotification] || The notification to inform SLL to monitor a tag. ||
|| http://big5sync.googlecode.com/files/pubclass.gif || [#NothingToSyncNotification NothingToSyncNotification] || The notification to inform the User Interface that there is nothing to synchronize. ||
|| http://big5sync.googlecode.com/files/pubclass.gif || [#NotificationFactory NotificationFactory] || Provides abstraction to create instances of classes which extend the !AbstractNotification class. ||
|| http://big5sync.googlecode.com/files/pubclass.gif || [#NotificationQueue NotificationQueue] || Provides implementation for Enqueuing and !DeQueuing of Notification. ||
|| http://big5sync.googlecode.com/files/pubclass.gif || [#PreviewProgress PreviewProgress] || The class representing a preview progress. ||
|| http://big5sync.googlecode.com/files/pubclass.gif || [#Progress Progress] || The abstract class for Progress. ||
|| http://big5sync.googlecode.com/files/pubclass.gif || [#RemoveTagNotification RemoveTagNotification] || The notification for removing tag. ||
|| http://big5sync.googlecode.com/files/pubclass.gif || [#SaveNotification SaveNotification] || The nofication for saving all the data. ||
|| http://big5sync.googlecode.com/files/pubclass.gif || [#SyncCompleteNotification SyncCompleteNotification] || The nofication for Sync Complete. ||
|| http://big5sync.googlecode.com/files/pubclass.gif || [#SyncProgress SyncProgress] || The class representing a synchronization progress ||
|| http://big5sync.googlecode.com/files/pubclass.gif || [#SyncStartNotification SyncStartNotification] || The notification to the User Interface that a Sync Request have been accepted and started. ||
|| http://big5sync.googlecode.com/files/pubclass.gif || [#TaggedFolderDeletedNotification TaggedFolderDeletedNotification] || The notification for a tagged folder deleted. ||
|| http://big5sync.googlecode.com/files/pubclass.gif || [#TaggedPathDeletedNotification TaggedPathDeletedNotification] || The notification for a tagged path deleted. ||
|| http://big5sync.googlecode.com/files/pubclass.gif || [#UnMonitorPathNotification UnMonitorPathNotification] || The notification for unmonitor path. ||
